duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive a roll-off truck along designated routes to mechanically collect, exchange, or deliver containers and transport to post-collection facilities.
Perform daily pre- and post-trip inspections; complete and submit vehicle condition reports at the end of the shift.
Courteously interact with customers and the general public along the route to answer questions or respond to requests.
Maintain and submit a DOT logbook, daily route/productivity sheet, and vehicle condition report as required by law or company policy.
Use key map and GPS to locate service addresses, follow safe operating practices, and ensure proper operation of the truck.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) desired.
Minimum one (1) year of commercial driving experience OR CDL school certificate
